name: Bloobert
description:
This game was made for Trijam #152 in only 3 hours. Catch asteroids in your mouth, and throw them up to keep everyone away from you!

Let's be real here, the game is basically if you took Kirby and made it so he couldn't do anything and hated everyone.

The score system is really janky but I only had three hours so you must simply cope.

Anyway, try to get a good score! I could only get 8 and its my own game. :(

Controls:

  • Open Mouth with W
  • Roll with A and D
  • Vomit Asteroids with Space
